title: Procurement of 09 Nos. Diesel Multiple Units for Upcountry Line operation of Sri Lanka Railways - SRS/F.7336
decision_details: - Cabinet approval was granted on 2015.12.16 to procure  09 Nos. Diesel Multiple Units for Upcountry Line operation of Sri Lanka Railways. Accordingly, open competitive bids were called and the proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala De Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation to   award the above contract of purchasing  09 Nos. Diesel Multiple Units for the Department of Sri Lanka Railways to the M/s Dongfong Electric International Corporation of the Republic of China, the lowest responsive bidder selected from among 04 bidders, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
